content:
/>
X.iv.2.B.1.b
.
Responsibility for Making a Homicide Determination
The development activity is responsible for making a homicide determination.
A homicide determination requires an administrative decision formatted in accordance with the guidance in
M21-1, Part X, Subpart v, 1.C.2
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section B  - Considering Eligibility When Homicide Is Involved
citation: Part X, Subpart iv, Chapter 2, Section B
